Crave TV App Re-design· Kyle Jackson Design

Crave TV App Re-design

Crave TV App Re-design

For this project I re-designed two screens that I felt were very important in the user experience. In my re-design I wanted to create an experience that customized to the user's interests.

In the re-design I wanted to create an simple flow that allowed the user to get from point 'A' to point 'B' in a few steps as possible to create a very easy-to-use flow.
